cwts.networkanalysis

Class GradientDescentVOSLayoutAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • cwts.networkanalysis.VOSLayoutAlgorithm
      • cwts.networkanalysis.GradientDescentVOSLayoutAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutAlgorithm, QualityLayoutAlgorithm, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GradientDescentVOSLayoutAlgorithm
extends VOSLayoutAlgorithm
    Gradient descent VOS layout algorithm.
    Author:
    Ludo Waltman, Nees Jan van Eck

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GradientDescentVOSLayoutAlgorithm()
      Constructs a gradient descent VOS layout algorithm.
      GradientDescentVOSLayoutAlgorithm(int attraction, int repulsion, double edgeWeightIncrement, int maxNIterations, double initialStepSize, double minStepSize, double stepSizeReduction, int requiredNQualityValueImprovements, java.util.Random random)
      Constructs a gradient descent VOS layout algorithm for a specified attraction parameter, repulsion parameter, edge weight increment parameter, maximum number of iterations, initial step size, minimum step size, step size reduction, and required number of quality value improvements.
